page.title: 12Clubs - Yardley
page.content: Over half of the people we questioned did not go to a club and did not know anything about clubs.Some of them pointed out the disadvantages of having clubs nearby i.e. being unable to park your car by your house and the noise and frights when the clubs closed.There seem to be 3 main types of clubs in the area;Social clubs which open every night,have bingo,dancing and darts. Clubs which do similar things on a quieter basis weekly or fortnightly. Youth groups which offer table tennis, outings and snooker and open, twice a week, for children up to 14. People approve of clubs since they help people to mix and belive there should be more clubs for teenagers to keep them out of trouble.
